value.halfverse: protect my life from fear of the enemy.
value.verse: Hear my voice, O God, when I complain; *
Hide me from the conspiracy of the wicked, *
They sharpen their tongue like a sword, *
value.halfverse: and aim their bitter words like arrows,

value.verse: That they may shoot down the blameless from ambush; *
value.halfverse: they shoot without warning and are not afraid.
they plan how they may hide their snares.
value.verse: They hold fast to their evil course; *

They say, “Who will see us?
who will find out our crimes? *
value.halfverse: we have thought out a perfect plot.”

but God will loose an arrow at them,
 and suddenly they will be wounded.
value.verse: The human mind and heart are a mystery; *

value.halfverse: and all who see them will shake their heads.
value.verse: He will make them trip over their tongues, *
Everyone will stand in awe and declare God’s deeds; *

value.halfverse: and all who are true of heart will glory.
value.verse: The righteous will rejoice in the LORD and put their trust in him, *
